mapper.select: select count(*) from mail_receive where status = 'Y' and emp_no = #{empNo}

select send_mail_no , sdpp , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rvst from( select send_mail_no , emp_name sdpp , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rv.status rvst from mail_send sd join employee using(emp_no) join mail_receive rv using (send_mail_no) where tem_status = 'N') where receiver_account = #{receiveAccount} and rvst = 'Y' order by send_mail_no desc

select send_mail_no , sdpp , sender_account , mail_title , mail_content , send_date , receiver_account , e2.emp_name rvpp from ( select send_mail_no , emp_name sdpp , sender_account , mail_title , mail_content , send_date , receiver_account from mail_send ms join employee e1 on (ms.emp_no = e1.emp_no) join mail_receive using(send_mail_no)) join employee e2 on(receiver_account = e2.email) where send_mail_no = #{sendMailNo}
select origin_name , change_name from attachment where ref_code = 'M'
mapper.insert: insert into attachment ( attachment_no , origin_name , change_name , file_path , ref_code , ref_no ) values ( seq_atno.nextval , #{originName} , #{changeName} , #{filePath} , 'M' , seq_sdmno.currval )
mapper.select: select count(*) from mail_receive rv join mail_send sd using(send_mail_no) where (rv.status = 'T' or sd.status = 'T') and (rv.receiver_account = #{receiverAccount} or sd.sender_account = #{senderAccount})

select send_mail_no , sender_account , emp_name sdpp , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rvst , sdst from( select send_mail_no , sender_account , emp_name , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rv.status rvst , sd.status sdst from mail_send sd join employee using(emp_no) join mail_receive rv using (send_mail_no) where tem_status = 'N') where (receiver_account = #{receiverAccount} or sender_account = #{senderAccount}) and (rvst = 'T' or sdst = 'T') order by send_mail_no desc
select count(*) from mail_receive rv join mail_send sd using(send_mail_no) where rv.status = 'Y' and rv.read = 'N' and rv.receiver_account = #{receiverAccount}

select send_mail_no , emp_name sdpp , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rvst , read from( select send_mail_no , emp_name , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rv.status rvst , read from mail_send sd join employee using(emp_no) join mail_receive rv using (send_mail_no) where tem_status = 'N') where receiver_account = #{receiverAccount} and rvst = 'Y' and read = 'N' order by send_mail_no desc
select count(*) from mail_receive rv join mail_send sd using(send_mail_no) where rv.status in ('Y') and rv.important = 'Y' and rv.emp_no = #{empNo}

select send_mail_no , emp_name sdpp , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rvst , important from( select send_mail_no , emp_name , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rv.status rvst , important from mail_send sd join employee using(emp_no) join mail_receive rv using (send_mail_no) where tem_status = 'N') where receiver_account = #{receiveAccount} and rvst = 'Y' and important = 'Y' order by send_mail_no desc
select count(*) from mail_receive where status = 'Y' and spam = 'N' and receiver_account = #{receiverAccount}

select send_mail_no , emp_name sdpp , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rvst , spam from( select send_mail_no , emp_name , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , rv.status rvst , spam from mail_send sd join employee using(emp_no) join mail_receive rv using (send_mail_no) where tem_status = 'N') where receiver_account = #{receiverAccount} and rvst = 'Y' and spam = 'Y' order by send_mail_no desc

select count(*) from mail_receive rv join mail_send sd using(send_mail_no) join employee e on (sd.sender_account = e.email) where sd.sender_account = #{senderAccount} and sd.status = 'Y' and tem_status = 'N'

select emp_name rvpp , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , send_mail_no , msst from(select mv.emp_no rvpp , mail_title , send_date , receiver_account , send_mail_no , ms.status msst from mail_send ms join mail_receive mv using(send_mail_no) where ms.sender_account = #{senderAccount} and ms.status = 'Y' and tem_status = 'N') left join employee on (email = receiver_account)

select count(*) from mail_receive rv join mail_send sd using(send_mail_no) join employee e on (sd.sender_account = e.email) where sd.sender_account = #{senderAccount} and sd.status = 'Y' and sd.tem_status = 'Y'
